FuncDef: This command configures matching on the SYN bit being set or reset in the control bits of the TCP header of an IP or IPv6 packet as an IP filter match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies matching on IP or IPv6 packets that have the SYN bit set in the control bits of the TCP header.
Specifies matching on IP or IPv6 packets that do not have the SYN bit set in the control bits of the TCP header.
